name: .T22
summary: Learn about .T22 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a T22 file with H&R Block Tax Software (2022 or later) in Windows and macOS. In post-2022 versions of H&R Block Tax Software, importing your T22 file allows you to use the information it contains to start that year's return.

You can use H&R Block Tax Software 2022 to save the tax return a T22 file contains as a .PDF (Portable Document Format) file. To do so, open the T22 file in H&R Block Tax Software 2021 and select File â†’ Save As PDF....

You can then use the PDF file as an easily-accessible backup of your 2022 tax return. You can also import the PDF file into other tax software if, for example, you decide to use another program to file your 2023 taxes.
